plot: When Ricky and the Mertzes wager that Lucy can't go a full day without telling a lie, her husband and friends feel more than a bit stung by her unabashed honesty.
title: "I Love Lucy" Lucy Tells the Truth
plot_es: When Ricky and the Mertzes wager that Lucy can't go a full day without telling a lie, her husband and friends feel more than a bit stung by her unabashed honesty.
original_name: "I Love Lucy" Lucy Tells the Truth
plot_en: When Ricky and the Mertzes wager that Lucy can't go a full day without telling a lie, her husband and friends feel more than a bit stung by her unabashed honesty.

cast.role: Woman Who Sings like a Chicken
cast.name: Dorothy Lloyd
